title: Rest Client cannot run with Hibernate Reactive Panache in same method
body:
### Describe the bug

Hello, the purpose of this report is about a problem when executing an operation that implies executing a GET request with restclient to the public API of TVMAZE and create an entity object and persist it through a panache repository but this launches the exception org.jboss.resteasy.reactive.common.core.BlockingNotAllowedException. I tried to add the annotations Blocking and NonBlocking on the method that executes them without success.

### Expected behavior

Get the information of a TV series and persist it in my database

### Actual behavior

Cannot complete request with restclient to API
